description: Enterprise techniques used by BOOTRASH, ATT&CK software S0114 (v1.1)
name: BOOTRASH (S0114)

techniques.comment: [BOOTRASH](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0114) has used unallocated disk space between partitions for a hidden file system that stores components of the Nemesis bootkit.(Citation: FireEye Bootkits)

[BOOTRASH](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0114) is a Volume Boot Record (VBR) bootkit that uses the VBR to maintain persistence.(Citation: Mandiant M Trends 2016)(Citation: FireEye Bootkits)(Citation: FireEye BOOTRASH SANS)
